releaseNotes:
This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

We are working hard to make FunEasyLearn app even better for learning languages. Here is what's new in this update:
- Our app is ready for iOS 10.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- You can now see and review the wrong words at the end of the game.
- We've slightly redesigned some games in the app to make it easier for everyone to use the app.
- You can now hear the pronunciation of a phrase spoken normally and spoken slowly.
- We've added speech recognition for improving your pronunciation.
description:
---All 6,000 words can be unlocked for FREE (by earning flowers)!---

FunEasyLearn is the easiest and most fun way to learn Norwegian language. With our app, you and your kids can learn speaking Norwegian quickly, so you could chat with foreign friends or find that international job that you desire.

Download our FREE Norwegian vocabulary app now!

Learn
* Over 6,000 words - with images, phonetic transcriptions and pronunciations recorded by native speakers.
* More than 15 thematic topics and 140 subtopics. 
* The entire 6,000 word vocabulary is available in 51 different languages: 
• English • Afrikaans • Albanian • Arabic • Azerbaijani • Bengali • Bulgarian • Catalan • Chinese (Simplified) • Chinese (Traditional) • Croatian • Czech • Danish • Dutch • Estonian • Filipino • Finnish • French • Georgian • German • Greek • Hebrew • Hindi • Hungarian • Icelandic • Indonesian • Italian • Japanese • Korean • Latvian • Lithuanian • Macedonian • Malay • Persian • Polish • Portuguese •Brazilian Portuguese • Romanian • Russian • Serbian • Slovak • Slovenian • Spanish • Swahili • Swedish • Thai • Turkish • Ukrainian • Urdu • Vietnamese

Fun
* 7 fun Norwegian vocabulary games: Vocabulary, Find Image, Choose Word, Listen & Choose, Match Words, Listen & Write and Write Word.
* "Review Manager" allows you to review all the words you’ve learned.
* "Spin Categories" feature chooses topics, subtopics and games at random.

Easy
* No internet connection needed.
* 3 levels – Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced.
* 51 interface languages.

Learn Norwegian app is available absolutely FREE!
-------------------

About FunEasyLearn.com:
Learning Norwegian is now fun, easy and free, all just with FunEasyLearn.com! With a collection of 6,000 words featuring image illustrations, recorded pronunciations and native translation support for 51 languages, the app will take your Norwegian language vocabulary and fluency to all new heights! This app covers thematic aspects from all areas of the world, giving you a robust hold over the language. It’s a valuable resource, which includes fun games created by industry experts.

FunEasyLearn is ideal for anyone who wants to learn Norwegian, English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, etc.

If you download our app and love it, please rate it and share this app with your family and friends via social media networks.

We appreciate your valuable feedback. If you have any questions, concerns or suggestions send us an email at support@funeasylearn.com
